faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How accurate is the disease detection?
faq.a1: Our AI model is trained on a vast dataset of plant images and is highly accurate. However, it should be used as a preliminary diagnostic tool, and we recommend consulting with a local agricultural expert for confirmation.
faq.q2: What data is used for crop recommendations?
faq.a2: The recommendations are based on a combination of factors you provide, such as soil pH and NPK values, along with real-time, localized weather data and current market trends.
faq.q3: Can I use this app offline?
faq.a3: Some features may have limited offline functionality, but the core AI-powered features like disease detection and crop recommendation require an active internet connection to communicate with our servers.
